pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:1.3: “The threshold”, ummāra, would seem to refer the entry point to the charnel ground. SP YOJ.1.263: Ummārepīti susānassa indakhīlepi, “Ummārepī: also at the entry post to the charnel ground.”
pli-tv-bu-vb-pc40:3.3.3: These are dung, urine, ash, and clay, see Pli Tv Kd 6:14.6.4.
